Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, desktop-file-utils, gir1.2-gsound-1.0 <!nocheck>, gir1.2-gtk-3.0, intltool, libcangjie-dev (>= 1.4.0.really.1.4.0-3~), libibus-1.0-dev, meson, pkgconf, python3-all (>= 3.2), python3-coverage, python3-gi, python3-pycangjie (>= 1.5.0.really.1.5.0-2~), xauth, xvfb <!nocheck>
Description: Cangjie and Quick input methods for IBus This is an IBus engine for users of the Cangjie and Quick input methods. . It is primarily intended to Hong Kong people who want to input Traditional Chinese, however, it should work for others as well (e.g. to input Simplified Chinese).
Uploaders: Anthony Wong <yp@anthonywong.net>, Anthony Fok <foka@debian.org>, ChangZhuo Chen (陳昌倬) <czchen@debian.org>,
